Using the giant statue as a medium, each of the five smaller heads encircling the statue's main head simultaneously release a stream of a different elemental nature attack.

== Influence ==
{{translation|''Issai Kaiku''|一切皆苦}} is a Japanese [[Wikipedia:Yojijukugo|four-character idiom]] for the first of the Four Noble Truths in Buddhist teaching, the [[Wikipedia:Dukkha|Dukkha]], specifically that all experiences are ultimately sources of suffering.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the manga and anime, it was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Blazing]]''.
